front.title: Multicast Requirements for a Network Address Port Translator (NAPT)

abstract.t: This document specifies requirements for a Network Address Translator (NAT) and Network Address and Port Translator (NAPT) that supports any-source multicast or single-source multicast. A multicast-capable NAPT device that adheres to the requirements of this document can optimize the operation of multicast applications that are generally unaware of multicast NAPT devices.
